source.title: Poaceae

source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (1994). Poaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaf-blades variably scabrous but not pubescent
Leaf-blades pubescent, with short, stiff hairs usually inclined to the leaf surface
Leaf-blades very fine (mostly less than 0.3 mm diam), bluish; plants often shortly stoloniferous
Leaf-blades mostly more than 0.3 mm diam, not bluish; plants tufted
